Title: Establishes the psilocybin assisted therapy pilot program for veterans and first responders
Summary: Establishes the psilocybin assisted therapy pilot program; provides such program will be offered to ten thousand veterans and first responders from the western region of New York state.
LawCode: Add ยง3309-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing a psilocybin assisted therapy pilot program for veterans and first responders
